name: The Dungeon's Depths
description:
The Dungeon's Depths is a short RPG made in 7 days for the GameDevNetwork: Cherry Jam by Rami Jhirad.
  • STORY

Banished by the grand wizard, You roam the Underearth in search of an escape so you may return to your family.  A curse binds you to this terrible place. You can never die and never leave, Stuck forever trying to escape and always returning in the dungeons any time you come close to escaping or die. Shall you be able to get strong enough to overcome the curse or shall you forever roam the Underearth's many dungeons as your sense of self and purpose fades from your soul, Leaving you as a dead husk forever damned to exist, but not live?  Able to see the light, But never reach it...

  • GAMEPLAY

The Dungeon's Depths is a short RPG where the dungeon's level is updated each time you die. The controls are as follows:

  • MOVE     -      [W] , [S] , [A] & [D]
  • ATTACK -      [ LMB ]
  • QUIT        -      [ALT. + F4]  (Sorry, I didn't think of a Quit button until now   :(    )
  • EXTERNAL TOOLS USED

          >Unity 2017.1 Free, Non-Commercial

          >Blender (Steam Version)

          >GIMP 2

  • GENERAL

My dog came running to me, snuggled by my feet and stared at me while recording the intro because he thought I was in pain. Not relevant to the game. Just thought it was cute.

P.S: PLEASE DO LEAVE FEEDBACK. I DON'T USUALLY SHARE MY WORK SO BOTH
NEGATIVE AND POSITIVE COMMENTS ARE REALLY APPRECIATED. I WOULD LOVE IT
IF YOU WOULD GIVE A MORE DETAILED BREAKDOWN OF WHAT YOU LIKED/DISLIKED
AND WHY AS IT WOULD HELP ME LEARN FOR FUTURE ENDEAVOURS.
